name: woby
description: A high-performance framework with fine-grained observable/signal-based reactivity for building rich applications.

scripts.git: git add . && git commit -m "Bump version" && git push
scripts.dev:benchmark: cd demo/benchmark && npm i && npm update && npm run dev
scripts.prod:benchmark: cd demo/benchmark && npm i && npm update && npm run prod
